basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Michael Metzger Memorial Endowed Scholarship for Mathematics
basic_information.committee_name: CMS - Mathematics and Statistics Scholarship Commi

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Math and Sciences pursing a degree in the Department of Mathematics and Statistics, Majoring in Math with an Economics Minor preferred. Eligibility Requirements College of Mathematics and Science student Major in Mathematics required, with minor in Economics preferred Minimum GPA of 3.5 Must have completed 60 hours of credit Provide two faculty recommendations Personal statement outlining financial need and career goals

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
